page.title: 19The Trout Farm
page.content: Although the{Kingfisher Trout Farm}is not very old it is still a pleasant and interesting place. There are lovely surroundings, mainly woodland. In fact about a quarter of the land belonging to the trout farm is grazing land and woodland. The trout farm was built in 1977 by Mr. Colin Ingrams; it was he who constructed the ponds, all spring fed. The water from the ponds is so clean that the{E.E.C.}have approved the water being pure enough to drink. The trout farm has a farm shop, 4 fly fishing ponds, all stocked with {rainbow trout,}and several coarse lakes stocked with coarse fish such as carp, tench, perch, roach and rud. There are one or two other ponds for general use. The trout farm breed their own fish and supply wholesalers as well as a
